answerText: Father Brown[10] This author of The Ballad of the White Horse created Father Brown and also wrote about the Central Anarchist Council which is made up primarily of undercover detectives in The Man Who Was Thursday.
heading: 2012 Penn-ance |2012 | 2 | 2 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The Innocence of [this character] is the first book of stories in which he appears, and his last appearance is in the separate work, The Mask of Midas. For 10 points each: [10] Name this detective who, in his first appearance, is followed by Valentin as he reveals Flambeau to be a thief in pursuit of the Blue Cross.
